title: Front Cover
content: A North American river otter (Lontra canadensis) enjoying a musk turtle snack in a spring-fed Florida river. The cover image relates to Short Communication “Assessing the diet of the elusive North American river otter (Lontra canadensis) in Florida using faecal DNA metabarcoding” [https://doi.org/10.1002/aqc.4257] by Bakker et al. Photo credit: Linda Wilinski.
siteTitle: Wiley: Aquatic Conservation: Marine and Freshwater Ecosystems: Table of Contents
